title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Very helpful!
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
body:
There mat not be a lot of thread on each spool, however worth the money. I have used this on several clothing repairs and it has been a wonderful help. Everything is good quality for the price. The black case can easily fit in my hand. Overall I'm very impressed as I have 2 boys in my house and they seem to need lots of repairs.

title:
1.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Don't bother--poor quality!
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
body:
I purchased this kit just to repair an inch-long opening in a seam. The needle case arrived chipped and broken and wouldn't turn so I could get a needle out. We tried everything but finally had to crack open the case just to get one needle out. The thread was poor quality and frayed as you handled it. The threader lasted only about 10 seconds. The scissors were not aligned properly. I know this kit wasn't expensive (as I said, I just wanted some needles), but even so, it wasn't worth the money.
  
Read more

title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Decent, you get what you pay for
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
body:
The needle dispenser gets stuck, and I broke the needle threader broke after only a few uses (of course the eyes of these cheap needles are really rough, so the threader got stuck, I probably should have tried pinching it to help it get out though?). But it's cheap so it's what you expect.
